entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a young boy who is participating in a task.

entities.name: crookshanks
entities.description: Harry's cat, present in the room with him.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: One of Harry's friends who is supposed to be back by now.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Another one of Harry's friends who has not returned yet.

entities.name: bagman
entities.description: A person mentioned in Harry's imagination, with a round-eyed surprise expression.

entities.name: karkaroff
entities.description: A person mentioned in Harry's imagination, with a satisfied and yellow-toothed smile.

entities.name: fleur delacour
entities.description: A person mentioned in Harry's imagination, who says that he is too young for the task.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: A person mentioned in Harry's imagination, flashing a badge with 'POTTER STINKS' written on it.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: A person mentioned in Harry's imagination, with a crestfallen and disbelieving face.

relationships.description: Harry is sitting on the couch with Crookshanks on his lap, as mentioned in the sentence 'Forgetting that Croo kshanks was on his lap, Harry stood up'.
Harry and Ron are friends, as mentioned in the sentence 'He had searched all the remaining books, and Ron and Hermione had not come back.'
Harry and Hermione are friends, as mentioned in the sentence 'He had searched all the remaining books, and Ron and Hermione had not come back.'
